Posts.Content: Hello, Thanks, Well I finally got an answer. I am scheduled for sugery Next tuesday the 30th. I am having two Bilateral Lumpectomys, they believe it is stage 1 and I am not loosing my boobies at this time..... :) I will start Radiation 2 weeks after and hopefully no chemo. deb
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: Biopsy done, Ductal carcinoma; Surgery in two weeks... I am sure many have it worse than me...Just trying to figure what next....I have not received any other news on it, Have no idea...what the pathology reports state as my dr's office closed due to a snow storm here in the north east...Guess there are other things that may come into play ...am I wrong?? just readding a lot since they told me...... Thanks to anyone who replies.... D..........
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: thank you, THis is all new to me. I have walked for Breast cancer etc...not really having any meaning to me except to help find a cure, help others,  Now I feel like I will be fighting not only for all but now me also.... opening me up is the scariest....what if it spreads, I have a 10 yr old boy and have no means of leaving him yet. !!
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: On Mar 09, 2013 10:56 PM katsarcow wrote: Stay in the moment.  What helps me with the waiting game, is if it's on a week-end or something I have to wait on, I really try to let it go until I can get back on the horse and take care of business.  All we actually have is this moment anyway.  Make the best (it's hard).  Thoughts and prayers.  LindaGThank you Linda , and everyone else, I'm pretty strong person and I try to live in the moment...like I said, it could be worse, I am thankful I found it right away, the stage not sure, trying to find that out, but I believe it is early..idk..trying to keep up with it all and still handle daily life, ii try not to let it bring me down believe me, I cant let it, i have amazing little boy... def try to deal with it best I can, it's everyone else who looks at me like it is a death sentence, lol , it is what it is and i have to deal with it, D..
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: On Mar 09, 2013 5:47 PM NWTF13 wrote: Biopsy done, Ductal carcinoma; Surgery in two weeks... I am sure many have it worse than me...Just trying to figure what next....I have not received any other news on it, Have no idea...what the pathology reports state as my dr's office closed due to a snow storm here in the north east...Guess there are other things that may come into play ...am I wrong?? just readding a lot since they told me...... Thanks to anyone who replies.... D.......... Ok, so surgery was cancelled March 26, did a Stero biopsy on right side, results still not 100% - sending me now to special Breast Cancer hospital to talk to new surgeons about a new Biospy to remove a chunk of tissue and possibly a Bi lateral Mastecomy....still have not been told what stage, my boobs feel like utters LOl ....Been a great few weeks!!!
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: You have to laugh, or me myself will curl up in a ball and fade away feeling sorry for myself. Just wish it was over with, running around seeing all these doctors is crazy, but I am happy they are all being so thorough. Good luck with your surgery tomorrow . Keep us posted on how you made out. I will be thinking of you. God bless you sweetie! deb
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: Thanks, Keeping my fingers crossed Surgery goes well tommrro and negative reults !! Deb Xo God bless you. I do not know how everyone can handle this as well as they do...

Posts.Content: Thanks, Keeping my fingers crossed Surgery goes well tommrro and negative reults !! Deb Xo God bless you. I do not know how everyone can handle this as well as they do...
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: They did one on my left , which was a mass and it came back positive. Then they were concerned about my right and they see calcium forming in a spot and did the Stero something... After they got the results, they sent it out for a second opinion  at Boston medical. Now that came back inconclusive and they wanted to do another Biospy with more tissue, Guess I am seeing New surgeons, Radioloist etc, on the 15th, I think they will be offering it to all get done in one surgery, if Postive, a bilateril masectomy, reconstrutive surgery etc... and the lump out of the right side.... from what all these Doctors are leaning towards and saying, right now my head is spinning .....
